t: The*pn Lord*s says to my lord: “Sit*pn at my right hand until*ld I make your enemies a*ld footstool for your feet.”
The*pn Lord*s will extend your mighty scepter from Zion, saying, “Rule*ld in the midst of your enemies!”
Your*ln troops will be willing on*ld your day of battle. Arrayed*ln in holy splendor, your*ld young men will come to you like*ld dew from the morning’s womb.
The*pn Lord*s has sworn and*ld will not change his mind: “You*ln are a priest forever, in*ld the order of Melchizedek.”
The*pn Lord is at your right hand; he*ld will crush kings on the day of his wrath.
He*ln will judge the nations, heaping up the dead and*ld crushing the rulers of the whole earth.
He*ln will drink from a brook along the way, and*ld so he will lift his head high.
